name: simple.buttons
tagline: A very simple, easy-to-use CSS button library
body: ###CDN ####`` ### ![Example of Buttons](http://i61.tinypic.com/255kge9.png "Example of simple.buttons") ### `Submit` ### ![blue-button](http://i58.tinypic.com/30cbx5d.png) ### `Submit` #### Six colors: blue, yellow, red, grey, green, and pink #### Three sizes: small, medium, and large #### Two shapes: rounded or regular(rectangular)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
